verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w elect|strong="G1588"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* acknowledging \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*:

Unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* everlasting, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* lieth \w not|strong="G3739"\w*, hath \w promised|strong="G1861"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w times|strong="G5550"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* world:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* hath \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w due|strong="G2596"\w* \w times|strong="G2540"\w* \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w preaching|strong="G2782"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* committed \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w commandment|strong="G2003"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* Saviour:

\w To|strong="G2596"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w* \w my|strong="G2596"\w* beloved \w son|strong="G5043"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w common|strong="G2839"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* Saviour.

\w For|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* cause \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w left|strong="G0620"\w* thee \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Crete|strong="G2914"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou shouldest \w set|strong="G1930"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w order|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w are|strong="G3778"\w* wanting, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shouldest ordain priests \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w appointed|strong="G2525"\w* thee:

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w without|strong="G3361"\w* crime, \w the|strong="G2192"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w accused|strong="G2724"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* riot, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* unruly.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* bishop \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w without|strong="G3361"\w* crime, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w steward|strong="G3623"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w not|strong="G3361"\w* proud, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* subject \w to|strong="G1163"\w* anger, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* given \w to|strong="G1163"\w* \w wine|strong="G3943"\w*, \w no|strong="G3361"\w* striker, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* greedy \w of|strong="G2316"\w* filthy lucre:
\w But|strong="G0235"\w* given \w to|strong="G1342"\w* hospitality, gentle, sober, \w just|strong="G1342"\w*, \w holy|strong="G3741"\w*, continent:

Embracing \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* convince \w the|strong="G3588"\w* gainsayers.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* disobedient, vain \w talkers|strong="G3151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* seducers: \w especially|strong="G3122"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1163"\w* reproved, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* subvert \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* houses, \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w for|strong="G3361"\w* filthy lucreâ€™s \w sake|strong="G5484"\w*.

\w One|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w a|strong="G3004"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w The|strong="G3004"\w* Cretians \w are|strong="G0846"\w* \w always|strong="G0104"\w* \w liars|strong="G5583"\w*, \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2342"\w*, slothful bellies.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*. Wherefore \w rebuke|strong="G1651"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w sharply|strong="G0664"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*;

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* \w giving|strong="G4337"\w* heed \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2451"\w* \w fables|strong="G3454"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* \w of|strong="G0444"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w turn|strong="G0654"\w* themselves \w away|strong="G0654"\w* \w from|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w defiled|strong="G3392"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w unbelievers|strong="G0571"\w*, \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w defiled|strong="G3392"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w profess|strong="G3670"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w in|strong="G2316"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w deny|strong="G0720"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w*; \w being|strong="G1510"\w* abominable, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* incredulous, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* reprobate.
